tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I wanted to express my heartfelt gratitude for the exceptional care and support I received during my pregnancy. Your attentiveness, understanding, and compassion made a world of difference in my experience. Every appointment was a reassuring and informative step in my journey, and your genuine concern for my well-being was evident at every turn. Thank you for making this special time in my life as comfortable and positive as possible. Your dedication and professionalism truly exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend her consultation for any pregnancy related query

Doctor is really helpful but staff is not good. I call their staff to get the reports if they can send me on WhatsApp. They said yes. I have waited for more than 1 hours for their reply. Call the three times still no response.
God knows if you do some operations there then for claim process what you have to gone through.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We our so grateful n would like share our gratitude to Dr Divyashree Mam'a n Dr Rashmi Mam'a  who made our dream come true n showed us new world of parenthood.... whn had left all our thoughts n given up on having a child.  We meet Dr Divyashree Mam'a, who was so confident n started d treatment n was helpful throughout the IVF journey n 2nd phase was pregnancy it was carefully handled by Dr Rashmi Mam'a.. we are now blessed with our baby boy..thanks is a small word who gave us new life n hope.. 2 Dr's who played vital role in our journey of 2+yrs to have a baby...at last not to forget Genea staff.. Always felt liveliness n positive n every visit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: The hospital was very nice. We had an appointment booked with Dr Rashmi through Practo. The wait time is usually high, if you just walk in. However, if you book an appointment then the good thing is that they honor it and try to cut the wait time. The doctor was very nice* ************* and understanding. She was super thorough with examination, explained everything in detail and spent good time answering all the questions that we had. She made sure that we were were satisfied and answered every single question that we had.

I would like to give genuine feedback for hedge hospital madhapur.I delivered my baby in this hospital on feb 25th 2018 which was almost 8 months back it’s very late that I’m writing this feedback but I wanted to share my experience so that it would be helpful for others to make the right decision before selecting Hegde hospital for their delivery. You can consult the doctors here but please don’t choose this hospital for delivery.Firstly I want to say that the doctors were well qualified and are very courteous so I don’t have any bad regrets of selecting Dr.Rashmi as my gynac.The service provided by the hospital during & after delivery was unsatisfactory.Why is there a need of a male ward boy inside the labor room & the operation theatre??Irrespective of whether they have less female staff or not.The patient/family should be consulted before a male ward boy being allowed into the labor room/ operation theatre.Also their anastheologist was a male.My husband was not even allowed inside the labor room/operation theatre inspire of requesting so much when I needed him the most.I have all these regrets because I selected this hospital for my delivery instead of choosing other top reputed hospitals because it was closeby to my house.Also their packages are as costly as the other top reputed ones in which this hospital doesnt even provide food or basic services that are given in every hospital to the patient post delivery.Please do not choose this hospital for delivery as I feel they have low experience in delivery and post delivery care.

dear Dr. rashmi mam

I was so worried about my wife's delivery. I didn't expected that surgery goes so much cool before surgery Dr. vandana mam and Dr. rashmi mam have taken so much of care on my wife I didn't saw any hospital like this my wife went for surgery in the morning and in the evening they made my wife to walk and excersise I was so surprises that my wife and baby are well and healthy. in the next day on surgery only my wife get down from 2nd for to ground floor by shells no one will date to go like that after surgery I was really surprised to see my wife like that. this all credit goes to Dr. rashmi mam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: After 7th year of our marriage my wife got conceived naturally. This all happened because of the treatment of Dr.Rashmi TN. Last year when we visited her that time only my wife got conceived, but unfortunately it got aborted coz of some reason. Again by the  treatment of Dr. Rashmi we got positive result. She is very friendly and have lot of patience to listen us. We will be very great full to her forever. Thank you

as we have conceived with Dr. vandana & Rashmi. both are supported us very much well. they have clarified our queries whenever we understood different types or test and checkup. and they are very care about their patients. hope the I'll do the same best service in the future also for all the patients. once again really thank both of the patients. once again I really thank you Dr. vandana mam and Dr. Rashmi mam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is a very friendly and motivated person, and when we were losing hope, she made us very strong with her sportsmanlike words. We haven’t seen anyone like her in our life, which means being a doctor, the way she took care of my wife is the ultimate. Because of her, we are so happy today with a full family frame. She also helped a lot with appointment-related issues. As per our convenience, she accepted the appointment. We will remember her in our lifetime. She should have everything that God has to offer her, and her family should be happy during her lifetime.

My wife visited her for MTP. Also she told remaining product is occupying a major space at uterus. We got doubtful and checked with * *********** gynecologist at renowned hospitals. **** ** **** **** ******* ** ***** *** ***** ** ******* ** ** **** ** ***** ** ** ***** *** ********* *** ****** ******* ********** ** **** *********** *** **** *** **** *** **** *** ****** ********** * ***** **** **** *** ****** *** ********** ******* **** ******* ********** ************ *** ****** ** *** **** ***** **** ***** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Doctor is **** *** friendly. She listen carefully and  answers all the questions.

Staff of the hospital is worstt. I have never seen such a lazy, care-less, unresponsive staff. **** ***** ***** ******** ***** *** **** * ******* ** **** * ******** *** they don't bother about patient concern. We need to wait about 2hr approx everytime even though we have booked an appointment. They gives the excuses that there is some urgent surgery etc for being late, rather they should inform patient about delay so that patient can plan their travel to hospital accordingly. Few time i came back without doctor consultation because doctor was busy and urgent surgery and staff didn't inform the patient. Staff don't listen to patient properly and they try to ignore if someone raise a concern about late timings. There is no point of having many people in staff if they are not working with responsibilty. 
At the end , staff is ruining the patient experience with hospital.

I have taken appointment at 6 and they have keep waited me for 3 hours,later Dr rashmi just said that i need to do my blood test for which i waited 3 hours which is not tolerable.After 3 hours she asked me to come with reports next day.

I went to docter again the next day nd they keep me waiting again hours saying many patients are waiting.Again she will the blood reports and said that i have to do  thyroid test ***** ** *** ***** ****** *** ******* ******

Instead of kee waiting patients ***** ****** ******* ***** ****** *** **** ******* ********

I would suggest dont go to this hospital.if you go they will test your waiting patience and at last you will loose your patience and will feel better step out from this hospital instead of having a checkup........

Reaching to the emergency contact no. is difficult most of the time, so it gets ringing and I had to try consecutively ground floor and first floor reception and failed to contact. I have been told that senior doctor wont talk to me directly which is demotivational as opinion of duty doctor and senior doctor is totally different and we always wants to talk to senior doctor which we failed. Hardly get a call back if somebody is in break or lunch.  Reaching to Hima Bindu is even more difficult as I have never got any call back till date and the person who picks up the phone doesn't have full information. 
Overall experience is good. Doctors give time and patient to listen us. Hospital ambience is good.

Dr.Rashmi is very supportive and always provides perfect guidance for each and every situation. when I meet her regular checkup, I never feel any fear or tensions related with my pregnancy. she had such positive personality and general heart. its so great experience to consult her through my pregnancy. THANKS LOT MAM.
